p: The tissue localization of O 2 •− was conducted according to the method described by Liu et al. [ 46]. Leaves were placed in 0.2 M phosphate buffer (pH 6.4) containing 1 mg mL −1 nitroblue tetrazolium (NBT) and 10 mM NaN 3 for 4 h at room temperature after brief vacuum infiltration three times (10 min each), and the leaves were then decolored in 95% ethanol.
